channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: University of Illinois study on assistive healthcare robots earns international award
item.description: The University of Illinois researchers said the project’s person-centered, goal-oriented approach was beneficial in narrowing down tasks. The post Uni...

item.title: Onboarding the AI workforce: How digital agents will redefine work itself
item.description: By 2030, AI will have evolved from a back-office assistant to a front-line collaborator in enterprise. Those who embrace it will thrive.

item.title: Novelty In The Game Of Go Provides Bright Insights For AI And Autonomous Vehicles

item.title: Bond yields rise with key data on tap
item.description: Bond yields rose on Monday as traders prepared for a week with crucial economic data.

item.title: Tokyo Game Show 2024 draws in the crowds — and the key people | The DeanBeat
item.description: I made it to Japan this week for my first Tokyo Game Show. Yes, in 27 years of regular coverage of games, I have never been to the show until now.

item.title: Advance Trustworthy AI and ML, and Identify Best Practices for Scaling AI

item.title: Why Microsoft’s security initiative and Apple’s cloud privacy matter to enterprises now
item.description: Microsoft's Secure Future Initiative (SFI) and Apple's Private Cloud Compute (PCC)'s goals are to harden cloud security and privacy at scale.

item.title: Why AI is a know-it-all know nothing
item.description: Today’s AI systems can’t earn our trust by sharing the reasoning behind what they say, because there is no such reasoning.

item.title: ‘I’m horrified and heartbroken’: I gave my family cash gifts for summer. One person bought AR-15 rifles and handguns. What should I do?
item.description: “I always give money to close family members with kids to help pay for summer activities.”

item.title: ‘I don’t want to spend my remaining days living hand to mouth’: I divorced my husband and remarried. Can I claim his Social Security?
item.description: “I hope that it doesn’t trigger my ex-husband. He has a short fuse.”

item.description: Cohere has confirmed that the V1 suite of APIs will continue to be supported for developers who are not yet ready to migrate.

item.title: China’s stock market is closing just as investment outlook is brightening up
item.description: The Shanghai Stock Exchange will close from Oct. 1 to Oct. 7 for the China National Day celebrations. Hong Kong’s market will be shut on Oct. 1.

item.title: Billionaire Snap CEO sells L.A. mansion after cutting $4 million off the price
item.description: Evan Spiegel can toast to another (semi) successful deal after finally securing a buyer for his Brentwood mansion.
